title: Bob's Red Mill Organic Corn Flour 25pound Bulk Bag, 400 Ounce
features: WHOLE GRAIN GOODNESS: Our Organic Whole Grain Corn Flour is always 100% stone ground and includes all of the nutrients from the bran, germ and endosperm
MULTIPLE USES: It’s wonderfully flavorful, and its fine texture produces a tender cornbread, or use in cakes, muffins and pancakes
VEGAN: All Bob’s Red Mill products are vegetarian; this product is also vegan, meaning it does not include eggs, dairy or honey
BOB'S RED MILL: Make folks a little happier: it’s the idea that keeps our stone mills grinding to fill every bag with wholesome goodness
description: Bob's Red Mill Organic Whole Grain Corn Flour is always 100% stone ground and includes all of the nutrients from the bran, germ and endosperm. It’s wonderfully flavorful, and its fine texture produces a tender cornbread that is richer and less crumbly than one made with corn meal.
